label: 摂関家
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: The sublineage of the Fujiwara house, whose members served as imperial regents in the Heian period, which split into five branches (gosekke) during the Kamakura period, with important offices rotating among them.　[藤原、五摂家]
